statements: SELECT * FROM knowledge_base;
SELECT topic, content FROM knowledge_base WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base WHERE topic = 'Programming' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT topic, content FROM knowledge_base WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT topic, content FROM knowledge_base WHERE content LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY topic ASC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base WHERE topic = 'SQL' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT id, topic FROM knowledge_base WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM knowledge_base WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated) AND topic LIKE '%database%';
SELECT id, topic, content FROM knowledge_base WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' AND topic ILIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY topic ASC;
SELECT id, topic, content, last_updated FROM knowledge_base WHERE topic NOT LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base;
SELECT question FROM knowledge_base WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, answer FROM knowledge_base WHERE question LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT id, category_name FROM categories WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base WHERE id = 1;
SELECT question, answer FROM knowledge_base WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base WHERE question LIKE '%database%';
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE id < 5 ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT id, question, answer FROM knowledge_base JOIN categories ON knowledge_base.id = categories.id;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base;
SELECT id, title FROM knowledge_base WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, content FROM knowledge_base WHERE title LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM customer_inquiries ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM customer_inquiries WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, content FROM knowledge_base WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_text, inquiry_date FROM customer_inquiries WHERE inquiry_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT r.response_id, i.inquiry_text, r.response_text, r.response_date FROM inquiry_responses r JOIN customer_inquiries i ON r.inquiry_id = i.inquiry_id;

SELECT k.id, k.title, i.inquiry_text, r.response_text FROM knowledge_base k LEFT JOIN customer_inquiries i ON k.id = i.customer_id LEFT JOIN inquiry_responses r ON i.inquiry_id = r.inquiry_id ORDER BY k.id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base_articles;
SELECT article_title, article_content FROM knowledge_base_articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT article_title, created_at FROM knowledge_base_articles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM article_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base_articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT article_title, created_at FROM knowledge_base_articles WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM article_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT article_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS total_comments FROM article_comments GROUP BY article_id HAVING total_comments > 5;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, title FROM KnowledgeBaseEntries;
SELECT title, content FROM KnowledgeBaseEntries WHERE category = 'SQL';
SELECT id, title, content FROM KnowledgeBaseEntries WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Categories;
SELECT name FROM Categories WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeBaseEntries WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM KnowledgeBaseEntries WHERE category = 'SQL';
SELECT id, title, content FROM KnowledgeBaseEntries ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT Users.name, Categories.name FROM Users JOIN Categories ON Users.id = Categories.id;
SELECT Users.name, UserRoles.role FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.role = UserRoles.role;
